verbose_text: Recent phase I and phase II clinical trials in humans have shown that the GPR40 agonist TAK-875 reduces fasting and postprandial blood glucose and lowers HbA 1c with efficacy equal to that of the sulfonylurea glimepiride without inducing hypoglycemia or evidence of tachyphylaxis.
evidence: GPR40 agonist TAK-875 reduces fasting and postprandial blood glucose and lowers HbA
